profile.name: Subhash Tatavarthi
profile.title: Enterprise Architect • AI Thought Leader
profile.tagline: Sharing insights on enterprise AI architecture, cloud-native solutions, and the journey of building intelligent systems at scale
profile.bio: I'm a software engineer and a content writer who enjoys turning complex problems into clear systems and clear stories. This blog is where I document experiments, wins, failures, and frameworks I'm testing in the real world.
